definition: Panchen (Lama)/abbr. for 班禪額爾德尼|班禅额尔德尼[Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2]
Panchen Erdeni or Panchen Lama/abbr. to 班禪|班禅[Ban1 chan2]
pinyin: Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2

sentences.english: Moreover, the Panchen Lama also has a keen interest in science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 不僅如此，十一世班禪還對科技具有濃厚的興趣。

sentences.english: However, their own Panchen Lama did not think so.
sentences.chinese: 但班禪自己並不這麼認爲。

sentences.english: China's government selected its own Panchen Lama in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府在中國選定他自己的班禪喇嘛。
